forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.
